ygData.subject: Virus spreading has NO place anywhere
ygData.msgSnippet: I am also going to write to a few folks on this matter.  There is always someone to mail to ... anyone else who received this should probably write to
ygData.messageBody:
I am also going to write to a few folks on this matter. There is always
someone to mail to ... anyone else who received this should probably write
to abuse@..., I seriously doubt bellsouth is going to be happy
about one of their users sending e-mail attachments containing
viruses. Its too damn bad. I've already mailed mine off to bellsouth..
who else will follow suit. He will likely lose his internet account at
least with this isp.
